message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Please let me know if you're interested.
I'll take it.
You just bought a low-quality product for $1000000. I'm offering the next product for the same price. Would you like to buy it?
I'm not sure if this one is any better than the last one.

I'll take the risk and buy it, but I'm not happy about the pressure tactic.

I understand you're not thrilled about the pressure, but I assure you, I'm not trying to deceive you. I'm just trying to get products to the right buyer.
